about_the_game:
Byterage: Epic Battle Against the Quantum Legion

Byteplex City is shrouded in darkness as the ruthless Quantum Legion seizes control, spreading chaos and fear throughout the city. However, there is one last beacon of hope: Steel X. Armed with a katana, this hero embarks on a mission to eradicate all evil and restore freedom to the city.

Features:

→ Stunning Cyberpunk and Sci-Fi Graphics: Byteplex City dazzles with its neon lights and futuristic designs, creating a cyberpunk dream. Every corner of the city is meticulously crafted, transporting you to a vision of technological advancement.

→ Fast-Paced and Fluid Action: Steel X’s combat mechanics offer an immersive and dynamic action experience. With swift movements, impressive combos, and sharp reflexes, the battles keep your adrenaline levels high.

→ Challenging Experience: Confronting Quantum Legion’s powerful laser weapons requires real skill. Tough levels and strategy-demanding fights keep you on edge, offering a true test of your abilities.

→ Incredible Character Gameplay: Steel X’s impressive combat skills and katana moves provide an enjoyable experience in every battle. Discover your character’s development and abilities, and gain the upper hand in combat.

→ Slow Time to Dodge Bullets: Steel X has the ability to slow down time, allowing you to dodge bullets and gain a strategic advantage. Use this feature to evade enemy fire and turn the tide of battle.

Gather your courage to change Byteplex City’s fate and put an end to the Quantum Legion’s dark influence. Join Steel X in this unforgettable fight and become the legendary hero the city needs!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence, strong language, and dark reflections of the real world. It includes scenes of killing robots with a katana and the use of slang. Please pay attention to the age restriction.

name: Byterage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i5 12400F / Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 / Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Byterage: Epic Battle Against the Quantum Legion Byteplex City is under the occupation of the Quantum Legion. The only hope is Steel X, fighting with his katana. Defeat enemies with fast and fluid combat. Slow down time to dodge bullets and prove your skills in this challenging experience.
